name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura
display_help: Warshades can generate Dark Fields to give themselves incredible defensive capabilities.

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Absorption
powers.display_help: Kheldians have a natural mild resistance to Energy and Negative Energy damage. This Auto power is always on and costs no Endurance.

display_info: 11.25% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Shadow_Step
powers.display_help: You can Teleport long distances. Shadow Step has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Gravity_Shield
powers.display_help: When you toggle on Gravity Shield, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage, deflecting away such physical attacks. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 22.50% resistance to smashing damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to lethal damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to smashing damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to lethal damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Orbiting_Death
powers.display_help: You surround yourself with orbiting particles and dark matter that will continually cause Negative Energy damage to any nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info: 1 ticks of 8.04 negative energy damage for 2.5s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Penumbral_Shield
powers.display_help: When you toggle on Penumbral Shield, you become highly resistant to Fire, Cold, and Toxic damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 22.50% resistance to fire damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to cold damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to toxic damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to fire damage, cold damage, psionic damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to toxic damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Shadow_Recall
powers.display_help: You can Teleport one of your teammates to yourself. The target must be a teammate or leaguemate and can be selected from the Team Window. You can also rescue a fallen teammate who may be in a hostile location, as long as he is on the same map. Range is not infinite, but extremely long and can be enhanced. This power can be interrupted. Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Shadow_Cloak
powers.display_help: You surround yourself with shadowy particles that bend the light around you, making you difficult to spot at a distance. You can be seen only at close range, or if you attack a target. Even if seen, the Shadow Cloak grants you a bonus to Defense and some protection from Immobilization. Shadow Cloak also allows you to see things in a new light, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Unlike some stealth powers, Shadow Cloak has no movement penalty. Shadow Cloak will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 3.75% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 0.75s on self
60.00% resistance to perception radius debuff for 0.75s on self
31.14% resistance to immobilize for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Twilight_Shield
powers.display_help: When you toggle on Twilight Shield, you become highly resistant to Energy and Negative Energy damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 22.50% resistance to energy damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to energy damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to negative energy damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Black_Dwarf
powers.display_help: Kheldians are masters of energy and matter. A Warshade can transform into a massive unstoppable essence draining beast known as a Black Dwarf. When you choose this power, you will have access to 6 other powers that can only be used while in this form. You will not be able to use any other powers while in Black Dwarf form. Black Dwarf has awesome resistance to all damage except Psionics, as well as controlling effects. Black Dwarf also has improved HP and Endurance Recovery, but is limited to melee attacks. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 37.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, toxic damage for 2s on self
-15.6 confuse protection, terrorize protection, hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 2s on self
-15.6 confuse protection, terrorize protection, hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 2.03s on self
37.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 2s on self
37.50% resistance to psionic damage for 2s on self
155.70% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, stun, sleep for 2s on self
186.84% resistance to immobilize for 2s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 2s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 2s on self
155.70% resistance to confuse, terrorize, hold, stun, sleep for 2.03s on self
186.84% resistance to immobilize for 2.03s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 2.03s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 2.03s on self
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 2s on self
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 2s on self
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 2.03s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Black_Dwarf_Strike
powers.display_help: The Black Dwarf Strike is a moderate melee attack that releases Nictus Dark Energy on impact, which can Knock Down foes, and slows a targets attack and movement speed. This power is only available while in Black Dwarf Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 6s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target
30.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
30.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Black_Dwarf_Smite
powers.display_help: Black Dwarf Smite is powerful melee attack that can often Disorient or Knock Down opponents. Black Dwarf Smite can also bring down fliers, and slows a targets attack and movement speed. This power is only available while in Black Dwarf Form. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 30.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
-20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 10s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 10s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 8.05s on target
10.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 2s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Black_Dwarf_Drain
powers.display_help: You tap the primal forces of your Nictus power to create an Essence Draining conduit between a foe and yourself. This will transfer Hit Points from your enemy to yourself. Foes drained in this manner have their attack and movement speed reduced. This power is only available while in Black Dwarf Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 6s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Black_Dwarf_Mire
powers.display_help: Black Dwarf Mire can drain the essence of all nearby foes, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and Accuracy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -20.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 6s on target
-20.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 6s on target
11.25% strength to smashing damage, negative energy damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Black_Dwarf_Step
powers.display_help: Black Dwarfs can Teleport long distances. Black Dwarf Step has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Black_Dwarf_Antagonize
powers.display_help: This power attracts the attention of a foe and all those around him. Use this to pull villains off of an ally in trouble. An Accuracy check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Stygian_Circle
powers.display_help: You can tap into your Nictus power to drain the remaining essence of all nearby defeated foes to heal yourself, and recover Endurance. The more defeated foes affected, the more you will be healed. Additionally, the more powerful the defeated foes you drain, the more health you will recover. Recharge: Slow

requires: (((((!(target>arch == Class_Lt_Grunt) && !(target>arch == Class_Lt_Sniper)) && !(target>arch == Class_Boss_Grunt)) && !(target>arch == Class_Boss_Elite)) && !(target>arch == Class_Boss_Archvillain)) && !(target>arch == Class_Boss_Monster)) && !(target>enttype == player)

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Nebulous_Form
powers.display_help: You can Phase Shift to become out of sync with normal space. Although you do not become completely Invisible, you are translucent and hard to see. You are intangible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space. Even gravity has a weak hold on you. You can jump great distances while in Nebulous Form. However, after 30 seconds the phase out effect will wear off. 30 seconds later, if this power is still active the user will become phased out once again. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Shadow_Slip
powers.display_help: Shadow Slip allows you to teleport very long distances, even across city zones. Activating this power will bring up a menu that allows the user to choose which zone they'll teleport to. Recharge: Very Long

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Inky_Aspect
powers.display_help: Inky Aspect allows you to sacrifice some of your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Stygian_Return
powers.display_help: Should you fall in battle, your Stygian Return can drain the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more Ht Points and Endurance are restored to you. Stygian Return will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 1 ticks of 289.14 heal for 0.5s on self

powers.name: Warshade_Defensive.Umbral_Aura.Eclipse
powers.display_help: The dark Nictus power allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Endurance of all nearby enemies and add to your own. It will also increase your resistance to all damage. The more foes affected, the more Endurance and Damage Resistance you will gain. Affected foes are unable to recover Endurance for a short while. Recharge: Very Long
powers.display_short_help: Melee (AoE), Foe -END, - Recovery; Self +End, + Res (All DMG)

display_info: 11.25% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 30s on self
